  For s = "abcdef", c = "b"  the result should be ('acdef',false)
  For s = "abcdedcba", c = "ab", the result should be ('cdedc',true)
  */
const reverseDelete = (s, c) => {
  const len = s.length
  const cLen = c.length
  let i = 0
  let j = 0
  let result = []
  while (i < len && j < cLen) {
    if (s[i] === c[j]) {
      i++
      j++
    } else {
      if (j === cLen - 1) {
        result.push(s.slice(i))
        i = len
      } else {
        j = 0
      }
    }
  }
  return [result, j === cLen - 1]
}

  selectWords("Hello world", 4) ==> ["world"]

const selectWords = (s, n) => {
  const words = []
  const length = s.length
  let i = 0
  while (i < length) {
    let j = i
    while (j < length && s[j]!=='') {
      j++
    }
    const word = s.slice(i, j)
    if (word.length === n) {
      words.push(word)
    }
    i = j + 1
  }
  return words
}

const tri = (n) => {

  let next = 1
